name: National Airways Corporation (Pty) Ltd
about: National Airways Corporation (NAC), established in 1946, is the largest general aviation company in Africa and one of the largest globally. Based at Lanseria International Airport in Johannesburg, NAC offers a comprehensive range of aviation services, including new and pre-owned aircraft sales, maintenance, parts, charter, international operations, air ambulance services, and aircraft leasing. The company also provides helicopter pilot and technical training through its accredited Aviation Training Organisation at Rand Airport. NAC is the world’s first Flight Safety Foundation BARS Gold Standard operator and operates a state-of-the-art Fixed Base Operation at Lanseria International Airport. With extensive experience and robust partnerships, NAC delivers market-leading, cost-effective solutions tailored to clients’ specific needs. NAC’s helicopter training programs range from ab-initio to advanced commercial qualifications, preparing graduates for roles worldwide.
